doc.name: handleQuery
doc.synopsis: Custom extension code for realtime queries
doc.description: Not actually a parameter. Query information via WSForm.api.php and write your own query code.
doc.parameters:
Add a folder with php code to the WSForm/modules/handlers/queries folder. (e.g. WSForm/modules/handlers/queries/yourhandlername)

In that folder there must be a file called query-handler.php. That code will be executed.

From JavaScript you can call WSForm.api.php in the WSForm folder with parameters you define.

Required parameters

  • action=handleQuery
  • handler=yourhandlername


All other options are passed to your query handling code.
doc.note: Since WSForm is only a pass through, your code must have security check build in.
